entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of thunderstorms near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:12 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:12 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
